bundle.sm9.league.season3.name: Sun & Moon—Team Up Season 3 Rewards
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Discard an Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Discard the top 8 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are {R} Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Put 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your opponent’s hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is the last card in your hand, you may play it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.
customchoice.bsp_bw67.electricannon: Would you like to discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon to do {0} more damage?
playmat.prompt.bw8_49.poltergeist: This is your opponent's hand. Your attack will do 20 damage for each Trainer card in it.
playmat.prompt.choosespecificenergy: Choose a {0} Energy to attach to one of your Benched Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.xy11_20.flareup: Choose {R} Energy cards to shuffle into your deck.
playmat.prompt.xy4_74.darkimpulse: Choose a {D} Energy card to attach to your Active Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.xy8_94.pitchblackspear: Choose an opposing Benched Pokémon-EX to damage.
product.sm10.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds
product.sm10.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds
product.sm10.booster.generic.sell-text: When you have a partner you can count on, nothing can stop you! With trust and practice, these Pokémon can tackle just about anything, so check out the amazing Pokémon pairings in the Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds expansion!
product.sm10.buildandbattlebox.evolution: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
sleeve.sm9.league.season3.name: Sun & Moon—Team Up Card Sleeves
specialvisualizations.hgss4_91.eyeofdisa: When this player puts a Basic Pokémon from their hand onto their Bench, that Pokémon will get 2 damage counters.
specialvisualizations.xy4_105.steelshelt: This player's {M} Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
